headline: How to Easily Collect Passive Income From Real Estate Without Buying a Rental Property
summary: Investing in REITs is an easy way to generate passive income from real estate.  Invitation Homes owns over 110,000 single-family rental homes that generate dividend income for investors.  Realty Income owns over 15,600 commercial properties that produce very stable rental income to support its rising monthly dividend.
